mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM toy_product_reviews R, toy_order_items I WHERE R.order_item_no = I.order_item_no AND I.product_no = #{productNo}
SELECT order_item_no as orderItemNo FROM toy_order_items WHERE product_no = #{productNo} AND order_no IN (SELECT O.order_no FROM toy_order O, toy_customer C WHERE O.customer_no = #{customerNo})

SELECT review_no as no, review_title as title, review_content as content, review_created_date as createdDate, order_item_no as itemNo, review_view as views, product_no as productNo, order_no as orderNo, customer_no as customerNo, customer_name as customerName, RN FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY review_no ASC) RN, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY review_view ASC) RN, R.review_no, R.review_title, R.review_content, R.review_created_date, R.order_item_no, R.review_view, I.product_no, I.order_no, O.customer_no, C.customer_name FROM toy_product_reviews R, toy_order_items I, toy_order O, toy_customer C WHERE R.order_item_no = I.order_item_no AND I.order_no = O.order_no AND O.customer_no = C.customer_no AND I.product_no = #{productNo} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginIndex} AND #{endIndex} ORDER BY RN DESC
